misuse: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values.
description: Use of a pseudo-random number generator without proper seeding can lead to predictable values being generated, making it easier for an attacker to guess or predict the generated value.
recommendation: Use a cryptographically secure random number generator to generate sufficiently random values.
